page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
Entertainment within Longfield takes place mainly in the home. For the theatre,concerts,and films,residents must go outside the area. Ownership of televisions and video-recorders is high,as is ownership of radios, music-centres and computers. Many households have two televisions and children often have a portable television in their bedrooms. The Parent Teacher Associations of the three schools often organise disco-dances and barn-dances;the Hartley Country Club provides a venue for sporting activities and relaxation afterwards in the bar. The public houses provide the traditional focal point for many residents.
